other_tests.findings: Pathological examination with Congo red staining showed no evidence of amyloid.

other_tests.date: Not specified (subsequent biopsy conducted approximately 60 days after initial presentation)
other_tests.findings: Follow-up biopsy showed chronic, active tubulointerstitial nephritis with an increase in fibrosis involving approximately 80% of the interstitium.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial biopsy showed acute and chronic tubulointerstitial nephritis involving 60% of the biopsy specimen.

other_tests.findings: Anterior uveitis, more severe on the left than the right.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Condition was addressed with topical prednisolone and intravenous methylprednisolone, leading to improvement.
